title: Dying Days 2
description: Dying Days 2St. Augustine, the oldest city in what used to be America… now an apocalyptic wasteland, where undead fight over the scraps…For Darlene Bobich and the remaining survivors it will be the ultimate test… zombies surrounding them, zombies coming from the ocean, across the Bridge of Lions… undead searching in eternal hunger…Continuing the adventure of Darlene Bobich, started in "Darlene Bobich: Zombie Killer"... "Dying Days"... and now "Dying Days 2"...
author: Armand Rosamilia
